body.p: Bowling Green, Kentucky, farmer and police judge of Bowling Green. Charlotte County, Virginia native. Married to Hetta Jackson Hines on May 12, 1817. Married to Tabitha A. Hines. Father of Martha Hines, Hetty Hines, Sarah J. Hines, John Hines and William H. Hines. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1857 to 1859. Owned thirty-three enslaved persons in 1860. Farmer in Bowling Green in 1860.
